I design interfaces that users love

Over 7 years of industry experience as a designer building user interfaces, websites and applications.

View projects About me

MOVIE PREMIERE REMINDER

Moviedates is a tool that allows you to create a reminder of how much time is left until the premiere of your next favorite movie.
Preview
The problem
There wasn't any app that would create reminders of upcoming movie premieres so I decided to make one by myself.
The goal
Create a tool to satisfy my needs and those of other potential users, practice interface design skills, user experience and web development.
Client
Personal project
Platform
Web
Agency
--
Role
UX / UI / DEV

Previews design / Concept

MOVIE PREMIERE REMINDER

Video

ONLINE VIDEO EDITOR FOR PUBLISHERS

FireClip is a web application that allows you to create and edit highlights videos from live or recent programming, allowing content creators to publish and distribute content either on social media or their own video platforms.
The problem
The tool had an inefficient interface and was limited to only basic editing functions.
The goal
Create different stages of product development by gradually adding new features. The design was created to be used as a basis for the development of the next 3 years of the software.
Client
Convergente SPA
Platform
TV
Agency
NED
Role
UI/ UX Designer

ONLINE VIDEO EDITOR FOR PUBLISHERS

Previews design / Concept

SMART TV APP

Estadio CDF, is a webOS application that allows you to enjoy the contents of CDF Live and On Demand (VOD) through streaming.
The problem
At the beginning of the project the streaming service had limited functionality, an old branding and it was only created to work on computer screens.
The goal
The goal of the redesign was to create an attractive and functional interface for tv, adapting the controls to the limitations of the device and showing the new identity of the sports pay TV channel.
Client
Canal del FÃºtbol
Platform
TV
Agency
NED
Role
UI Designer
